# Bug Fix PR

## Issue

Link to the issue, ticket, or incident.
Fixes #

## Root Cause

What actually caused the bug?

## Fix Description

What did you change to fix it?

## Regression / Risk

- [ ] Low
- [ ] Medium
- [ ] High (explain below)

## Testing

Show how you verified the fix:

```bash
pytest -v
ruff check .
mypy .
```

- [ ] Reproduced the bug before the fix
- [ ] Verified the bug is gone after the fix

## Checklist

- [ ] Added or updated tests
- [ ] No secrets or credentials affected
- [ ] Commits are GPG/SSH signed
- [ ] Reviewer(s) requested
